title: Sheek kavaab naan with malai tikka naanwich
description: Delicious lamb sheek kebabs and malai chicken tikka with homemade naan bread make this the recipe for a full-on Indian feast.For this recipe you’ll need thick metal skewers, or wooden skewers that have been soaked in cold water for ten minutes.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz lamb shoulder, sinews and gristle removed, roughly chopped
20g/¾oz coriander leaves and stalks, roughly chopped
20g/¾oz mint leaves and stalks, roughly chopped
2.5cm/1in piece fresh root ginger, roughly chopped
500g/1lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into small cubes
1 tbsp lightly crushed, toasted cumin seeds
